body:
## Learn more about United Kingdom Security Vetting

To learn more about UK security vetting, you can follow the link below.

[About security.](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/security-vetting-and-clearance)

components.html: You must wear your pass and make certain it is visible at all times when inside 102 Petty France and Clive House.

heading: Security Pass application
lede: Use this form to apply for a security pass online. A security pass will grant you access to the building of Ministry of Justice at 102 Petty France and Clive House.
